apa katha kala yuththe yuddhaye jaya parajaya gana nowa yuddhaya awasan kirima nisa merata sama jana kottasayakatama uda wi athi samaya gana yayi jathika bhasha ha samaja eekabaddhatha amathi wasudewa nanayakkara mahatha sandahan karayi.ohu ese sandahan kale rathnapura nawa nagaraye sabaragamuwa palath sabha shrawanagaraye pawathi samaja eekabaddhatha sathiye samapthi ulelata sahabhagi wemini.mema samaja eekabaddhatha sathiya pasugiya wasare mulwarata janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage mulikathwayen pawathi athara mewara eya dewana waratath diwayina pura samaruni.mewara samaja eekabaddhatha sathiya samapthi dina wishesha aaradhitha deshanaya sabaragamu maha amathi mahipala herath mahatha wisin sidu kala athara wachanayen nowa kriyawenma samaja eekabaddhathawaya sandaha sabaragamu maha amathiwarayage kapawima agayamin ethumata ema awasthawa laba dena ladayi jathika bhasha ha samaja eekabaddhatha amathyanshaya pala kala hethu patawala sandahan wiya.mahi di adahas dakwu amathi wasudewa nanayakkara mahatha sandahan kale bhauthika washayen bedi thibu rata eksath kala mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma eda rata eksath kirima sandaha nokarama bariwa thibu yuddhayak sidu kala bawaya.yuddhaye jaya parajaya katha kirimen parajayata path wu parshwaye sith thawulata pathwana bawa ki amathyawaraya apa katha kala yuththe yuddhaye jaya parajaya nowa yuddhayen pasu rate samastha janaya athwindina shanthiya bawa sihipath kale ya.bedunu rata eksath kala janadhipathithuma bedunu jathiya eksath kirimata da dan katayuthu karanawa.ee sandaha me rate pradhana jathika bhashawan wu sinhala ha damila bhashawan deka sama purawasiyekuma igena ganimath sambandhikarana thewana bhashawa lesa ingi්rasi basa igenima paladayaka bawath ohu sandahan kale ya.jathin athara samanathmathawa anekage sanskruthiyatath anekage ndadahasatath garu kirima haraha jathiya eksath kala hakiyayi ki ohu uthuru palath sabhawa haraha ehi bahuthara janathawa wu damila janathawage wisheshithathawan da prakashitha wiya yuthu bawa kiya.anekage bhashawa nodanima merata wargika gataluwata ek hethuwak winayi ki ohu ingi්rasi haki saha nohaki samaja wishamathawa awasan kirime awashyathawa da awadharanaya kaleya.sabaragamu maha amathi mahipala herath mahatha - samaja eekabaddhathawa aarambha kala yuththe pasal panthi kamarayen bawa kiya.
apa waga kiwa yuththe upan bimata misa wides bimakata, wides jathinta no we.
